content.rendered:
AqualisBraemar and HOSE International are pleased to announce their partnering to provide world class Rig & Well Control Equipment Inspection Services. This strategic partnership brings together the very best industry Subject Matter Experts from the areas of Well Control, Dynamic Positioning and Rig Assurance. 

We understand that the combining of our company’s expertise and experience strengthens our services. This provides our clients with a different way to protect their reputation and assets with safe and compliant operations, which enhance performance.

Our services are supported worldwide with a network spanning 50 offices and 33 countries.

To find out how AqualisBraemar & HOSE International can enhance your operations, download the combined capability statement or contact:

wce@hoseinternational.com | +44 (0)1224 519 599

rig.inspection@aqualisbraemar.com | +44 (0) 1244 442 140

For further information, please contact:

Investors and financial media

Kim Boman, CFO, AqualisBraemar ASA
Telephone: +47 959 63 912

Other media enquiries

Endre Johansen, Corporate Communications AS
Telephone: +47 41 61 06 05
Email: endre.johansen@corpcom.no

About AqualisBraemar ASA

AqualisBraemar ASA (OSE: Aqua) is a public listed company that, through its subsidiaries and associates, offers adjusting, marine, offshore and renewables consultancy services to the energy, shipping and insurance industries. The group employs specialist engineers, naval architects, master mariners, loss adjusters and technical consultants in 48 offices located across 5 continents in 33 countries. AqualisBraemar ASA operates under three distinct brands globally:

  • AqualisBraemar: a leading adjusting, marine and offshore consultancy to the energy, shipping and insurance industries
  • AqualisBraemar Yacht Services: a specialised marine consultant to the superyacht market
  • Offshore Wind Consultants: an independent consultancy to the offshore renewables sector

excerpt.rendered: AqualisBraemar and HOSE International are pleased to announce their partnering to provide world class Rig & Well Control Equipment Inspection Services.

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar and HOSE International enter inspection partnership
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar and HOSE International have signed a memorandum of understanding to jointly provide rig and well control inspection services for the offshore industry.

jetpack-related-posts.title: How to Survive a Rig Inspection: WCE revisited
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Now that AqualisBraemar has teamed up with HOSE International, we revisit the topic of Well Control Equipment.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Rig inspection & dynamic positioning assurance continues
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar and Hose International inspection teams have been continuing to support a client's rig intake program through this difficult time.

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar sets up office in North East of England
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar has set up a new office in the Port of Tyne to support its rapidly developing rig inspection services and to be closer to numerous clients in the North East of England.

jetpack-related-posts.title: How to Survive a Rig Inspection: Part 4
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: In this 16 part series, our head of Rig Inspection Services Steven Lee shares tips on how operators and owners can get through rig inspections with flying colours – and which pitfalls to avoid! Mr Lee has more than a hundred rig inspections under his belt, from all parts of…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Rig inspection contract to AqualisBraemar
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Brunei Shell Petroleum Company Sdn Bhd (BSP) has awarded AqualisBraemar a frame agreement to conduct rig inspection services for the operator.
